Products.title: Products

Products.singInText: Please, sign in to make a purchase

About.title: About Us
About.description: Nay's Dreams transforms your ideas into reality through sublimation. We are passionate about creating unique and personalized products that tell your story.
About.historyDescription: Nay's Dreams was born from a passion for creativity and the desire to offer personalized products of high quality. What started as a small business has become a reference in the world of sublimation.
About.historyDescription2: Each piece we create is made with dedication and attention to detail, ensuring the highest quality in every product that leaves our workshop.
About.commitmentDescription: At Nay's Dreams we commit to offering products of the highest quality, using first-class materials and cutting-edge technology in sublimation.
About.descriptionContact: Contact us today and tell us about your project. We are here to help you make it real.

Contact.title: Contact us
Contact.description: We are here to help you!
Contact.question: Do you have questions? Do you need help? Don't hesitate to contact us.

Footer.title: Footer
Footer.description: Transforming ideas into reality through sublimation. Unique and personalized products with the best quality.

Orders.alertText: The order will be sent directly to WhatsApp
Orders.alertText2: You'll be directed to WhatsApp. Once in the app, you can send your photos for sublimation.
Orders.confirmText2: Once you confirm, it will be attended to soon.

Policy.title: Privacy Policy
Policy.infoText: Nay's Dreams commits to protecting the privacy of our clients. This policy describes how we collect, use, and protect your personal information, as well as the terms of use of our website.
Policy.userText: You have the right to access, correct, or request the deletion of your personal information at any time. Write to us at
Policy.policyBuyText2: All our products are personalized, so returns are not accepted except for errors on our part.
Policy.policyBuyText3: If your order arrived damaged or incorrect, contact us within 3 business days from receipt with photographic evidence.
Policy.policyBuyText4: We are not responsible for errors in the data provided by the client (such as misspelled names).
Policy.policyBuyText5: Once the final design is approved, no modifications are accepted.
Policy.changeText: We reserve the right to update our policies. Any change will be notified in this same section.

Conditions.title: Terms and Conditions
Conditions.acceptText: By accessing and making orders on our website or social networks, you accept the present Terms and Conditions. If you do not agree, please do not use our services.
Conditions.useSiteText: This website is intended for personal use only. It is prohibited to use it for commercial purposes unrelated to Nay's Dreams without prior authorization. It is not allowed to use our services for commercial purposes.
Conditions.useSiteText2: We do not have a payment platform, so you must contact us to make the payment.
Conditions.orderBuyText: All our products are personalized, so returns are not accepted except for errors on our part.
Conditions.orderBuyText2: We collect 50% in advance and once your product is ready, you collect the other 50%.
Conditions.orderBuyText3: This is to prevent the client from making a fake order.
Conditions.orderBuyText4: Once the first payment is made, the order is processed and in case you want to cancel, you lose the 50% of the payment.
Conditions.orderBuyText5: Once the final design is approved, no modifications are accepted.
Conditions.designText: The client is responsible for reviewing and approving the designs before printing.
Conditions.designText2: We are not responsible for errors not corrected in this stage.
Conditions.designText3: The final design cannot be modified once sent to production.
Conditions.shipmentText: We ship throughout Lincoln via courier.
Conditions.shipmentText2: Our Company is responsible for any delays or damages caused by the courier.
Conditions.shipmentText3: The client must review their order upon receipt.
Conditions.shipmentText4: In case of error in the provided address, the second shipment will be covered by the client.
Conditions.changeText: No changes or returns are accepted in personalized products.
Conditions.changeText2: Only products will be returned if there was a clear error on our part.
Conditions.changeText3: It is mandatory to notify within 72 business hours from receipt.
Conditions.propertyText: All content of Nay's Dreams (logos, designs, photos, products) is intellectual property of the brand. Its reproduction without permission is prohibited.
Conditions.modifyText: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. The modifications will be available in this same section.
Conditions.contactText: For inquiries about these terms, call:

Video.title: Videos
Video.description: We have wrappers available for your orders. Contact us for more detail
